title: I would really like to see the full art of Ocean Week Fizz
body:
Not sure if this is the appropriate forum, but I guess this pertains to art in general which is kind of related.

Does anyone else find that Fizz actually looks a lot better in the ocean week icon than in his original splash? 
Reply if you would like to see the full art from which the Fizz icon is made from, please give it to us as a gift for ocean week as well!

replies.body:
Hey Everythingllbeok!

I worked on the Fizz icon and I have to disappoint you by saying that there is no splash-art beyond what is in the icon T.T

When we create the icons, we work on the small square canvas directly (so it's not a crop or anything). The intention is to keep laser focused on considering the icon's context (small and square) when painting.

Hi Tomblade, thanks for the reply!

Yes, I thought it unlikely that the icon is a crop of a splash -- but wouldn't it be awesome if you guys use this as a concept and turn it into a full splash? Maybe to promote ocean week? I know I'd find it quite awesome :D

Thanks once again for your warm replies!

This Icon:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/summoner_icon_article.jpg?itok=n3R6EyNq

Would make an excellent Fizz art!
I don't believe that splash actually exists :| Creating splash art takes a really long time and I'd imagine that one was just done as an icon
Yeah, but it would be awesome. Why wouldn't Riot do something awesome? Perhaps as a bonus Ocean Week Promotion?
Question: what are you talking about?
